Uses of Class
model.Entity

Packages that use Entity
Package
Description
model
 
view
 

  • Uses of Entity in model

    Subclasses of Entity in model
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Bomb
    Class of objects thought to be the bombs of the game.
    class 
    BombFaster
    Particular bomb with fewer pre-explosion phases.
    class 
    BombRemote
    special bomb whose explosion is determined by the player's input and not by the transitory phases.
    class 
    BombStandard
    Standard bomb model.
    class 
    Enemy
    An NPC with hostility true against the player character.
    class 
    EnemyBombEater
    An enemy that eats bombs it can find in the direction it is moving.
    class 
    EnemyBoss
    A special enemy whose defeat allows you to complete the stage
    class 
    EnemyBossClown
    A concrete EnemyBoss object
    class 
    EnemyBossSergeant
    A concrete EnemyBoss object
    class 
    EnemyBossUfoBrain
    A concrete EnemyBoss object.
    class 
    EnemyPyro
    This enemy represents a special effects that damage the player character as an enemy when collides with him.
    class 
    EnemyRunner
    An enemy that can fly without limits in the game grid.
    class 
    EnemyShooter
    An enemy that can shoots EnemyPyro in casual direction.
    class 
    EnemyUnstoppable
    An unstoppable enemy doesn't use visitor mover for moving so it isn't affect by solidity collisions
    class 
    Figure
    Figure is an entity that exists within the game grid, it occupies a specific space entirely and does not move.
    class 
    Fire
    The only Prop that have lethality true.
    class 
    GameCharacter
    A Game Character is an entity that lives and moves in the game panel but in doing so interacts with the grid.
    class 
    NonPlayableCharacter
    This class models non-player characters.
    class 
    Obstacle
    These Prop are breakable and solid.
    class 
    PlayerCharacter
    Class models an instance of Player Character
    class 
    PlayerCharacterConcrete
    Instance of a concrete player character
    class 
    PowerUp
    Power Up class.
    class 
    Prop
    They are the objects use to be bundle to Tesserae.
    class 
    TesseraAbstract
    TesseraAbstract is the super type of each concrete Tessera.
    class 
    TesseraConcrete
    class of a concrete Tessera that can be instantiated.
    class 
    Wall
    These Prop are unbreakable and solid.

  • Uses of Entity in view

    Subclasses of Entity in view
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DecoratedBomb
    Decorated Bomb for BombStandard and BombFast
    class 
    DecoratedBombRemote
    Decorated Bomb only for BombRemote
    class 
    DecoratedEnemyBoss
    Decorated version of an EnemyBoss
    class 
    DecoratedFire
    Decorated Prop version of a Fire from Model
    class 
    DecoratedMrPyroWhiteBlue
    Special DecoratedNonPlayableCharacter version for MrPyroWhiteBlue.
    class 
    DecoratedNonPlayableCharacter
    This class is a second level of abstraction to decorate an NPC component in a more specific way.
    class 
    DecoratedNonPlayableCharacterWithDeathImage
    This class is a third decoration step for Decorated Object in which death image is predefined
    class 
    DecoratedNpcDuo
    This class is a forth decoration step for a Decorated Object that is represented in two possible direction of movement during its animations.
    class 
    DecoratedNpcDuoRunner
    This class is a DecoratedNpcDuo class with Runner type.
    class 
    DecoratedNpcMono
    This class is a third decoration step for a Decorated Object that is represented in only one direction of movement during its animations.
    class 
    DecoratedNpcTetra
    This class is a third level of abstraction to decorate an NPC component in a more specific way.
    class 
    DecoratedObstacle
    DecoratorProp for an Obstacle type object
    class 
    DecoratedPlayerCharacter
    This class gives its supertype the footages array and lists and also the way to process these animations.
    class 
    DecoratedPowerUp
    Decorated version of a Prop object implementing Powerupper interface
    class 
    DecoratedTessera
    Decorated version of a Tessera object
    class 
    DecoratedWall
    Decorated version of a Wall object
    class 
    DecoratorBomb
    Decorated version of a Bomb object
    class 
    DecoratorNonPlayableCharacter
    This class is a first decorative shell of an NPC component in the way of Decorator Design Pattern.
    class 
    DecoratorPlayerCharacter
    Decorated version of a PlayerCharacter to implement its View animations in a Decorator Design Patter way.
    class 
    DecoratorProp
    Decorated version of a Prop to implement its View animations in a Decorator Design Patter way.
    class 
    DecoratorTessera
    Decorated version of a TesseraAbstract to implement its View animations in a Decorator Design Patter way.
